title: Champ selection freezes to 0 + cannot pick = LP loss
body:
Hi guys,

So it had been a while now that I've been experiencing this issue.

Sometimes while I'm in champ selection, if other people pick/lock in close to 0, my client doesn't follow to the next summoner. Basically, I end up staring at my mac and my turn never comes.

Already fixed through the help fix button, uninstalled and reinstalled, don't know what to do anymore.

Any suggestions?

thanks

replies.body: It sounds like your network is losing connection to our servers during champion select, and freezing because it's not receiving information.  My suggestion would be to go over the steps in our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this.  There will be an option to select Mac instructions, which are specific to your OS.  I hope that helps, but let me know if you have any issues!
